Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Interesting place for a town, I must say. Quite a few monsters around no? I am called $Actor_36$, and I'm quite interested in those monsters. I can make it worth your while if you bring me them and any other Artifacts you might find.]
[Text:Ah! I'm hoping you can help me. I'm looking for the following items!][Name:Requests]
[Name:Selection][Text:Aha! Welcome! How can I help you today?][Selection:MerchantTalk]
[Text:I may be used to life on the road, but I'm always happy to arrive in a nice place such as this!][Default][Name:3]
